short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension removes the twitter engagement button from every tweet.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Purely a cosmetic change to Twitter.com. 

This extension removes the engagement button on tweets which puts the like button back to its original place. 

This is meant for people who click the engagement/views button by accident since the new update.
